sentences.english: The pick withdraws, replaced by Andy's peering eye.
sentences.chinese: 石錘收回，取而代之的是安迪隱現的目光。

sentences.english: The moon peeped out from behind a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 月亮從一片雲後隱現出來。

sentences.english: No games are available yet, but they will slowly start appearing over the course of December.
sentences.chinese: 沒有遊戲可用，但他們會漸漸開端正在十仲春中隱現。

sentences.english: In the disappearing existence sentences, the verbs must be mono-valent ones.
sentences.chinese: 隱現句中的動詞只能是一價動詞。

sentences.english: If there are problems looming, move early to raise capital.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的公司危機隱現，那麼請儘早籌集資金。

sentences.english: Mountainous cliffs, looming in among the pines and cypresses.
sentences.chinese: 峯巒峭壁，隱現於蒼松翠柏之中。

sentences.english: Their answers always indicate they are too busy.
sentences.chinese: 而失掉的問雙經常皆隱現他們真正在太閒了。

sentences.english: She showed great curiosity about my past.
sentences.chinese: 她對我的疇昔隱現出莫大年夜的獵奇。

definition: overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
